root.name: textSpace()
root.description: Sets the way text draws to the screen. In the default configuration, OBJECT_SPACE, it is possible to rotate, scale, and place letters in three dimensional space, etc. Changing to SCREEN_SPACE draws letters directly to the screen and increases the rendering quality for 2D typography. The letters draw at the actual size of the font (in pixels) and therefore calls to textSize() will not affect the size of the letters. To create a font at the size you desire, use the "Create font..." option in the Sketch menu.
